message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14000. This is a special offer tailored for you, considering the value you believe it holds at $12000. Let's make this deal happen!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the offer, $14000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  I'm happy to pay $12000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.
